# Assets Folder

## ECI Logo for PDF Reports

To add your ECI logo to the PDF reports:

1. **Logo Requirements:**
   - File name: `eci-logo.png`
   - Recommended size: 200px wide x 100px tall (or similar aspect ratio)
   - Format: PNG (supports transparency)

2. **How to Add:**
   - Place your logo file in this `assets` folder
   - Name it exactly: `eci-logo.png`
   - The system will automatically detect and use it in PDF reports

3. **PDF Integration:**
   - Logo appears on the title page of combined PDF reports
   - If no logo is found, the system uses text-based "ECI" branding
   - Logo is automatically sized to fit the report layout

4. **Supported Formats:**
   - PNG (recommended)
   - JPG/JPEG (also supported)
   - GIF (basic support)

## Current Status
- [ ] ECI logo not yet added
- [ ] Using text-based branding

Once you add `eci-logo.png` to this folder, it will automatically appear in all future PDF reports.
